attributes.action: Remove Lord Amhed's Title and remove him from the House of Lords
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lord's Ahmed's conviction for dangerous driving means he is not fit to be a Peer of the Realm and to sit in the House of Lords. We call upon the Prime Minister to remove Lord Ahmed from the House of Lords immediately.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
